q = load "DPS_PSP_RAW"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_28) }};q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_29) }};q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_30) }};q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_31) }};q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_32) }};q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_33) }};q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_9) }};q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_10) }};q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_11) }};q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_12) }};q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_13) }};q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_14) }};q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_15) }};q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_16) }};q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_17) }};q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_18) }};q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_19) }};q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_20) }};q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_21) }};q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_22) }};q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_23) }};q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_24) }};q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_25) }};q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; q = group q by 'Questions'; q = foreach q generate Questions as 'Questions', avg('Answer') as 'PSP_Score';

q = load "DPS_PSP_RAW"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_28) }};q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_29) }};q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_30) }};q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_31) }};q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_32) }};q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_33) }};q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_9) }};q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_10) }};q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_11) }};q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_12) }};q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_13) }};q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_14) }};q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_15) }};q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_16) }};q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_17) }};q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_18) }};q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_19) }};q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_20) }};q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_21) }};q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_22) }};q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_23) }};q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_24) }};q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_25) }}; cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["3 months ago".."3 months ago"]; diff = group cur by 'Questions', last by 'Questions'; diff = foreach diff generate last.Questions as 'Questions',avg(last['Answer']) as 'Last Month', avg(cur['Answer']) as 'Current Month', avg(cur['Answer'])-avg(last['Answer']) as 'Percent_Diff';

parameters.text:
This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP grouped by regions of the country in
 the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP grouped by 4P, 5P and 6P stores for the 
country in the latest month.
This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP for the country over a period of last 12 months.
This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant grouped by top 
customers for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant grouped by categories 
for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were Place compliant for the country in 
the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant for the country over a 
period of last 12 months.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant grouped channels for 
the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant grouped by regions of 
the country in the latest month.
This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Place compliant in the latest month.

This chart displays the list of percentages of PSP and SSP grouped by each question 
for the latest month, and also the percentage increase or decrease compared to 
the previous month.

This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP grouped by top customers for the 
country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP grouped by channels for the country 
in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of SOS, PSP and SSP grouped by categories for the country 
in the latest month.
